channel.title: EmbeddingModels on MCP Toolbox for Databases

item.title: Gemini Embedding
item.description:
Getting Started

Google Gemini provides state-of-the-art embedding models that convert text into high-dimensional vectors. To use Gemini embeddings, you must first obtain an API Key from the Google AI Studio.

Once you have your key, configure the embeddingModels section in your tools.yaml with the model identifier (e.g., gemini-embedding-001) and the dimensionality of the vector output.

Behavior

Automatic Vectorization

When a tool parameter is configured with embeddedBy: <your-gemini-model-name>, the Toolbox intercepts the raw text input from the client and sends it to the Gemini API. The resulting numerical array is then formatted before being passed to your database source.
